Khloe Kardashian Clothes

VN:F [1.9.22_1171]
please wait...
Rating: 9.7/10 (19 votes cast)

Khloe Kardashian Clothes are loved by her dedicated fans. Check out our favorite selections of Khloe Kardashian Clothes available online. Keeping Up With The Kardashians has cultivated a loyal following of people who love Khloe and her unique style. We love to hear your Comments on your favorite As Seen On Khloe Kardashian Clothes! Feel free to rate our selections.

Ricci Star Blazer – as seen on Khloe Kardashian Clothes – designed by Patterson J Kincaid

100% Polyester, Imported.







 

Luxe Twill 811 Mid-Rise Skinny Leg in Many Colors – as seen on Khloe Kardashian Clothes – designed by J Brand

Slim-fit luxe twill 811 mid-rise jeans featuring faux front pockets and back patch pockets. 8.5" rise, 29" inseam. SINGER22 model is 5’7" tall and wearing a size 24. 98% Cotton, 2% Spandex. Made in the USA.







 

Skinny Jean in Loved Destroy – as seen on Khloe Kardashian Clothes – designed by Current/Elliott

Slim fit five pocket dark wash jeans with front whiskering and fading, heavy distressing down front legs and on pockets and paint-like stains throughout. 9" rise, 33.5" inseam, 12" leg opening. 99% cotton, 1% stretch. Please note: These jeans run large compared to standard designer sizing. We recommend sizing down one size.







 

Signature Blouse in many colors – as seen on Khloe Kardashian Clothes – designed by Equipment

Equipment Signature Blouse in Many Colors* Fabrication: Washed silk.* 100% silk.* Dry clean.* Imported.







 

Houlihan Skinny Cargo Pants in Vintage Olive and many Colors – as seen on Khloe Kardashian Clothes – designed by J Brand

These super-sexy cargos will become a part of your daily uniform this season. They’re casually perfect with a tank top and flip flops, or dress them up with a pair of towering heels and a sexy top for a night out to dinner and the clubs with your army of best girlfriends.J Brand Houlihan Skinny Cargo Pants in Many Colors*Skinny Cargo*Low-Rise*10.5-Inch Leg Opening*29-Inch Inseam*7.5-ounce Luxe Japanese Twill*98% Cotton, 2% LycraP>Vintage Olive is a SINGER22 Exclusive







 

Love Sick Cowgirl Desert Fringe Hooded Poncho in 2 Colors – as seen on Khloe Kardashian Clothes – designed by Wildfox

Hooded jersey tee featuring elbow-length raglan sleeves, "Lovesick Cowgirl" lettering and fringe hem. Measures approximately 28" from shoulder to start of fringe. SINGER22 model is 5’8" tall and wearing a size XS. 100% Cotton. Made in the USA.
